title: Ambassador Baloch hosts luncheon for FoodAG 2024 participants
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 23 (APP):Amna Baloch, Pakistan’s Ambassador to the European Union, Belgium, and Luxembourg, hosted a luncheon in Brussels for companies participating in the forthcoming second edition of FoodAG 2024, scheduled to be held in Karachi from August 9 to 11, 2024.
According to a press release issued here, participants received a briefing on trade and investment opportunities in Pakistan’s dynamic agriculture sector and were assured of the country’s warm welcome.
FoodAG 2024, the Second International Food & Agriculture Exhibition 2024 organized by TDAP at EXPO Center Karachi, aims to unite international and local communities under the theme “Growing a sustainable future,” fostering hope for a shared future.
